t: Amazon is quietly shutting down Fabric.com, one of the largest online fabric stores | The Verge
s: October 20, 2022 - Fabric.com is one of the largest online retailers of fabric, known for its robust offerings and lower prices for sewing materials. The company, acquired by Amazon in 2008, told vendors it plans to shut down.

t: Elastic Fabric Adapter — Amazon Web Services
s: Elastic Fabric Adapter (EFA) is a network interface for Amazon EC2 instances that enables customers to run applications requiring high levels of inter-node communications at scale on AWS. Its custom-built operating system (OS) bypass hardware interface enhances the performance of inter-instance ...

t: The Rise & Fall Of Fabric.com – Welcome Fabric Fans!
s: While I almost always do my best ... fabric dot com was the only place to find what I was looking for. I had mostly stopped burchasing from them because their customer service ease of ordering had declined over the past few years ( even prior to Covid) I did not learn that they were owned by Amazon until about a year ago – I feel like they didn’t really promote that in their brand...
